MAN.TITLE: bool2s
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: convert boolean matrix to a zero one matrix.

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : a boolean vector or a boolean matrix or a constant matrix

DESCRIPTION.P: If x is a boolean matrix, bool2s(x) returns the matrix where "true" values are replaced by 1 and "false" value by 0.
If x is a "standard" matrix, bool2s(x) returns the matrix where non-zero values are replaced by 1.
